author: andschwa
body: This updates the releasing documentation to reflect the addition of `Create-MSIPackage`. @raghushantha, I added a pretty short note. Please feel free to add anything else you think should be documented to this branch, and merge when ready. --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/powershell/powershell/1054)

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Being a documentation update, I'll go ahead and merge this.

title: Update releasing notes for WiX
